nodes.text: The Capital-class starship was a starship manufactured by Hoersch-Kessel and Gwori Revolutionary Industries. The ship was shaped with a flat underbelly and elongated pod. Powerful hyperwave transceiver arrays were housed on the lateral wing, which transected the hull of the ship.
In 65 BBY, a newly-constructed Capital-class vessel transported Hego Damask and Larsh Hill from Malastare to Naboo.

The description of the Capital-class is similar to that of the Munificent-class star frigate, a Clone Wars-era vessel also produced by Hoersch-Kessel and Gwori. The Capital-class may have been a predecessor to the Munificent-class.
